results.title: The Journey's rewards
results.creator_credit: Darren Kane, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: When Darren Kane first travelled to India, he loved it. However, his time there set him on another journey, one that would take him around the world and deep inside himself.

results.title: This is my offering
results.creator_credit: Stefanie Christian, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Stefanie Christian dedicates her story to the person who supported her throughout her illness, loved her unconditionally and helped her to envisage a bright future full of adventure.

results.title: Boy from the block
results.creator_credit: Jeffrey Robertson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Jeffery Robertson grew up in a tough neighbourhood where survival was a daily imperative. Later on in life, this survival instinct would kick in to fight discrimination in the community and to feed his will to live.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Jeffrey Robertson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Jeffery Robertson grew up in a tough neighbourhood where survival was a daily imperative. Later on in life, this survival instinct would kick in to fight discrimination in the community and to feed his will to live.
description_for_label: Jeffery Robertson grew up in a tough neighbourhood where survival was a daily imperative. Later on in life, this survival instinct would kick in to fight discrimination in the community and to feed his will to live.

results.title: Journeys into the unknown : Digital Storytelling project
results.brief_description: Eight members of the community tell their stories of living with HIV. With a fierce zest for life and adventure, they tell of how their lives have changed but also of how they have fought back against the disease and look forward to the journey ahead.
results.title_for_label: Journeys into the unknown : Digital Storytelling project

results.title: Here, there & back again
results.creator_credit: Wayne Hornsby, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Wayne Hornsby was in Thailand when he was diagnosed with HIV. He reflects on his journey, nearly dying and his return to Australia, where his work in helping HIV positive people eventually leads him back to Thailand.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Wayne Hornsby, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Wayne Hornsby was in Thailand when he was diagnosed with HIV. He reflects on his journey, nearly dying and his return to Australia, where his work in helping HIV positive people eventually leads him back to Thailand.
description_for_label: Wayne Hornsby was in Thailand when he was diagnosed with HIV. He reflects on his journey, nearly dying and his return to Australia, where his work in helping HIV positive people eventually leads him back to Thailand.

results.title: For my true love
results.creator_credit: Russell Varney, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: When Russell and Wendy were both diagnosed with HIV they resolved to lean on each other as they feared discrimination. Eventually they reached out to organisations like Straight Arrows and started to feel alive again.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Russell Varney, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: When Russell and Wendy were both diagnosed with HIV they resolved to lean on each other as they feared discrimination. Eventually they reached out to organisations like Straight Arrows and started to feel alive again.

results.title: The Vale of Kashmir
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Journey into the Himalayas”.
The Vale of Kashmir has been the destination of tourists for centuries. Kashmir is renowned throughout the world for its exquisite crafts and exotic houseboats lining the shores of picturesque Dal Lake. Keith Adam looks behind the tourist facade to find the lifestyle of the real Kashmiri.

results.title: The Bakrawallahs
results.creator_credit: Stafford Garner and Australian Broadcasting Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Journey into the Himalayas”.
Keith Adam visits the Bakrawallas, nomadic goatherders living in the remote and beautiful peaks of Kashmir. We follow the events from announcement to ceremony of a Wedding between a groom of sixteen and a veiled bride
